confirm.description:
Do you want to add a new device?

![AIS logo](/static/icons/ais_logo_works_with_dom-100-black.png)

This wizard works with devices having ** open source and free ** software developed as part of the project [Sonoff-Tasmota] (https://github.com/arendst/Sonoff-Tasmota). The software is installed on devices ** AI-Speaker **, it can also be an alternative software for devices manufactured by many manufacturers.

Details in the documentation [Works with AI-Speaker] (https://sviete.github.io/AIS-docs/docs/en/ais_iot_works_with.html)
confirm.title: Dodawanie urządzenia AIS

one.description:
![AIS logo](/static/icons/ais_s20_1.jpg)

Make sure the device is within range of the WiFi router.
In the next steps we will attach them to your local WiFi network and to the gate **AIS dom**
one.title: Connect the device to the power supply.

two.description:
![AIS logo](/static/icons/ais_s20_2.gif)

The pairing mode is signaled by the blinking of the LED on the device.
To start the pairing mode, press the button on the device 4 times quickly and wait for its LED to blink.

Then start searching for the device by pressing **SUBMIT**
